mapper.insert:
replace into person_info( peopleCd, peopleNm, peopleNmEn, person_bdate, nationality, person_pic ) values
(#{item.peopleCd}, #{item.peopleNm}, #{item.peopleNmEn}, #{item.person_bdate}, #{item.nationality}, #{item.person_pic})

insert into person_distinct( movieCd, peopleCd, person_job ) values
(#{it.movieCd}, #{item.peopleCd}, #{item.repRoleNm})
mapper.select: select movieCd from person_distinct where peopleCd = #{peopleCd} order by movieCd desc
select distinct peopleCd from person_distinct where movieCd = #{movieCd} and peopleCd != #{peopleCd} and person_job='배우' order by peopleCd
select p.movieCd as mov, movieNm, poster from person_distinct p inner join movie_info m on p.movieCd = m.movieCd where p.peopleCd = #{peopleCd} order by p.movieCd desc
